place.name: CASTLETON
place.gazetteerText: Castleton.-- par. and vil. with ry. sta. (New C.), S. Roxburghshire, 21¼ miles S. of Hawick and 74 miles SE. of Edinburgh -- par., 68,152 ac. (294 water), pop. 2256; vil., pop. 924. (In 1887, John Bartholomew's Gazetteer of the British Isles)
